ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the properties on NumericAxis and DateTimeAxis including TextFormatting, VisibleRange, AxisAlignment and the effect of changing them.
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b]
- Show/Hide Major Grid Lines and Ticks. - Change XAxis or YAxis Text Formatting. - Swap YAxis from Right to Left alignment. - Manually change XAxis or YAxis VisibleRange.
